Vasiliev: "...it's coordinates of the entrance into the laboratory X16. An entrance is in basement of 
central building, the tasks of this building are unknown. Probably technical suplies for underground 
oscillators: studying document from N*** exposes destiny of this project: it is large-scale 
psychotronic development of mass influence on...

 ...we have all necessary documents, we know how to disconnect an emitter. We continue to go 
down with Ghost into a laboratory. Zombies are everywhere climbing on light...

 ...averything's going wrong, Ghost absolutely not responsible for his actions, talks some delirium. 
He seems to be covered with a radiation. I gave up everything and leave through tunnels...

 ...am I on bogs, where bunker? Damn, damn, damn it!!! I can not define where I am! Sakharov's 
coward, does not answer!!! What's going on??? ... zombies are all around, cartridges are coming to 
an end..."

Sakharov: "All you have to do it's to find the dead body of Vasiliev and obtain exact information \nabout the location of laboratory. Then get to the laboratory and find Ghost. Ghost knew how to \ndisconnect a emanation and how to get out from there."
Sakharov: "If you and our employee will do measurings, I will give you the adjusted prototype which \nallows you to get to the laboratory."
Sakharov: "If you and our employee will do measurings, I will give you the adjusted prototype which \nallows you to get to the laboratory."\n

Sakharov: "Well done, Branded One, you got all the same to the laboratory. It is extremely important 
for us to study plant which is in a laboratory. Try to cut it off, so that we would be able to explore 
her.

 ...listen, a prototype doesn't protect from a strong radiation during a long period of time. I foresaw 
such case, therefore when you will get under strong radiation a timer turns on. When time is up a 
prototype will not be able to protect you anymore. Be more careful, and do not forget about a timer."

Ghost: "Record of N257
 >>Guide, I will send a man to you, we have important information for Doctor, assist him
 >>Ghoust
 Good, but Ghost, not as at the last time, well you'd better come yourself, I want to talk with you'. I'll 
be waiting as usual, in a camp near a bridge, don't disappear and look out army patrols."
Sakharov: "What happened? Is he dead? Take measurements and turn back immediately!!!"

I am shocked! Ghost and and a person on the picture in PDA, attached to the task "kill Gunslinger", 
is the same man. I don't understand anything. It means that some error happened. But who assumed 
it? There's no answer yet. And there's no time. Zombies are climbing from all cracks. On a dead 
body I found instruction, how to disconnect plant: it is necessary to turn off three knife-switchs on 
three tiers of this giant device. After that it will be possible to turn off a basic knife-switch on a basic 
stand on the third tier. The area of the most powerful radiation spreads only within the limits of 
sphere so I got not more than 1 minute for turning off one of knife-switchs - my defence will not stand 
it. So I must disconnect knife-switchs one by one, each time going back into a safe place out of 
sphere till expiration of this minute.

So it is done with a «Psy-brain». The source of psy-radiation is turned off, and it was exactly it. All 
neighbourhood was under influencing of «psy-brain» plant- it zombified everyone, who was in the 
area of its action. I found out there is another plant in the laboratory of ?19 and probably it is «brain 
scorcher». I also found out, that these plants not always work on full power. There are periods when 
it lowers power of radiation for cooling its aggregates. As for Ghost. On a dead body I found the 
name of «common acquaintance» and fourth in a group of Gunslinger - Doctor. He helped for a long 
time a group and executed, to all appearances, the role of «staff». It is possible to find him through 
stalker on a nickname «Guide» - which, often is on ? border. Well, Guide, look out of occasionally 
dying before we meet.

Well, I almost in a step from one of the people of Gunslinger. Ghost went away in the underground 
laboratory of ?16 with one of the scientist. There's just one "but" - I'll hardly find him alive. A scientist 
returned from there alone and perished already on approach to the camp. Scientists gave me a 
certain protective device for protecting from this unknown emanation. I hope it will justify itself. They 
want me to worm into inward and turn off a source of emanation - so they will be able to study 
everything in this place. Well, God bless me..

 Vasiliev was scared at the last moment and instead turning off lower stands, just ran away, when a
